value:
Put your heart into it, put your heart
into it...

My father was a strong and brave
man, but also gentle.

I'm impressed by all your hard work,
$Nu.$k$pLet me know if I can help in any way.

The sword is swung using the motion
of the hips and legs. That's why I
stretch before heading into battle.

I keep Lord Shannan's words in mind.
"Put your heart into your technique
and the path to Astra will open."

My name is Mareeta. I'm training in
the ways of the sword while I stay
with $Nf.

Hah! Hah! Yah! Tyah! My sword
movement is still too slow. I need
to get faster, stronger!

I am the daughter of Eyvel of Fiana!
I cannot lose here!
I will become even stronger!
All right! I am ready to fight!

I am Mareeta, and Eyvel of Fiana is
my mother. I will protect everyone
with this blade!

People tell me that I am...that I have
become stronger. I am starting to
believe them but...$k$pSome nights, though I don't know
why, I feel like crying.$k$pWhen my heart is shaken like that, it
affects my blade, and I feel the
weight of that uncertainty as I hold it.$k$pThat weakness of heart is the reason
my blade falls short of my mother's.
I doubt I can match her as I am now.$k$pAh, please don't be concerned! I just
get this way sometimes. Thank you
so much for listening!$k$pI have decided not to harbor regrets.
I vow to do my very best for you,
$Nu!
たあっ
えやあっ
ああっ…
I can still fight...
Put your heart into it.
A decisive strike!
Just like my mother!
Witness my strength!
Bitter defeat...
sigh...
Good technique comes from the heart. Shannan taught me that.
Aah! Don't startle me like that!
My power is growing. I can feel it.
When technique and heart are one, the path to the true Astra will open...
I have never hated my father. Not once.
Mother, Father, please look after me...
It is my sincere pleasure to fight for you.
Understood.
Give me an order.
Heart perfects technique.
